speakers.name: JUSTICE STEVENS
speakers.text: May I ask this question, 1111 14th Street, NW Suite 400 General?

speakers.name: JUSTICE STEVENS
speakers.text: There are really two kinds of Batson problems as I see it. speakers.name: JUSTICE STEVENS

speakers.name: JUSTICE STEVENS

speakers.name: JUSTICE SCALIA

speakers.name: JUSTICE STEVENS
speakers.text: Right.

speakers.name: JUSTICE SCALIA
speakers.text: Yes.  Assuming that the -- the attorney did not think that he or she was striking the juror because of the juror’s race.

speakers.name: JUSTICE KENNEDY

speakers.name: JUSTICE SCALIA

speakers.name: CHIEF JUSTICE ROBERTS
